isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX 2150 - AIR LEAKAGE TESTS - DISCHARGE VALVE LEAKAGE

svcproc.title: DISCHARGE VALVE LEAKAGE
svcproc.para: Unloader piston leakage must be repaired before this test is performed. Leakage past the discharge valve can be detected by removing the discharge line, applying shop air to the unloader mechanism and the discharge port and listening for the escape of air at the compressor inlet cavity. A barely audible escape of air is generally acceptable; however, if there is any question as to the leakage rate, it is recommended that the cylinder head or compressor be removed and repaired or replaced. With shop air still applied at the discharge port, apply a soap solution to the valve stop recess on the top of the head. lf leakage is detected, the cylinder head must be repaired or replaced. Only genuine International service parts and kits should be used.
